l:dependency.name: ASM Core
l:dependency.l:description: A very small and fast Java bytecode manipulation framework

l:dependency.name: Commons Logging
l:dependency.l:description: Commons Logging is a thin adapter allowing configurable bridging to other, well known logging systems.

l:dependency.name: Xerces2 Java Parser
l:dependency.l:description: Xerces2 is the next generation of high performance, fully compliant XML parsers in the Apache Xerces family. This new version of Xerces introduces the Xerces Native Interface (XNI), a complete framework for building parser components and configurations that is extremely modular and easy to program.

l:dependency.name: Apache Commons Digester
l:dependency.l:description: The Apache Commons Digester package lets you configure an XML to Java object mapping module which triggers certain actions called rules whenever a particular pattern of nested XML elements is recognized.

l:dependency.name: Commons BeanUtils
l:dependency.l:description: BeanUtils provides an easy-to-use but flexible wrapper around reflection and introspection.
